definition: lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
rain/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],場|场[chang2]
(light) silk/CL:匹[pi3]
surname Miao
mu (Greek letter Μμ)
to wind round
variant of 謬|谬[miu4]/error/erroneous
old variant of 繚|缭[liao3]
old variant of 穆[mu4]

sentences.english: Companies have been socking cash away for a rainy day since the financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 发生金融危机以来，美国企业一直在未雨绸缪地存钱。

sentences.english: Saturn may have taught you financial lessons about saving for a rainy day and budgeting.
sentences.chinese: 土星可能浅谈未雨绸缪和预算节省您的财务经验。

sentences.english: And there are other threats to health that we need to anticipate.
sentences.chinese: 我们还要未雨绸缪，准备应付健康面临的其它威胁。

sentences.english: It is normal that comparisons are made, but now we must think ahead.
sentences.chinese: 这在比赛中是很正常的，但现在我们必须未雨绸缪。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, the bureau is wise to plan ahead.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当局的未雨绸缪是明智的。

sentences.english: How much should you tuck away for a rainy day?
sentences.chinese: 多少你的小卖店距离未雨绸缪？

sentences.english: But Villarosa is careful here as well and has rainy days in mind.
sentences.chinese: 但维拉罗萨心怀谨慎，未雨绸缪。

definition: see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
to prevent troubles before the event (idiom)/to forestall/to nip sth in the bud
Preparedness averts peril./to be prepared, just in case (idiom)
to think of danger in times of safety/to be vigilant in peacetime (idiom)
to nip in the bud (idiom)
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
to be sentimentally attached to sb or sth
to scheme/to plot/conspiracy
lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)/fig. to act belatedly/better late than never/to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted
know yourself, know your enemy (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
absolutely safe/surefire/thorough
Wanquan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
response/to answer/to reply
surefire; absolutely safe (idiom)
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
